item.title: CIVITAS RESOURCES INC 10-K
item.description: CIVITAS RESOURCES INC, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 22, 2023 had 45560 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
